['', '•\xa0Experience writing grant applications for early-stage research preferred', '•\xa0Maintain familiarity with scientific literature to identify novel mechanisms of action (MOAs) for development and evaluation', '•\xa0Work with Discovery team members to develop prototypes for testing', 'Qualifications', '•\xa0Tech savvy with confidence in the transformative potential of software as treatments', '•\xa0Design and conduct exploratory research projects to optimize cognitive and behavioral interventions and related product features', 'Stock options | Competitive salary with annual review | 401(k) matching | Annual performance-based cash bonus | Comprehensive medical benefits through Aetna | Flexible Spending Accounts | Life insurance and disability benefits | Open vacation policy / unlimited PTO | Generous paid parental leave | Commuter subsidies | Monthly catered lunches | Choice of Mac, Windows, or Linux equipment | Sponsored company events | Free, unlimited office snacks and beverages | Much more…', 'Location:', '•\xa0Experience in representative populations (see Click product pipeline) and with behavioral interventions preferred', 'The Scientist I reports directly to the leading Scientist in the Translational Sciences office and will contribute directly to the development, digitization and optimization of cognitive and neurobehavioral mechanisms of action for Click Therapeutics’ products. The Scientist I will also analyze data collected from past and ongoing projects in innovative ways.\xa0The Scientist I, Translational Sciences will build a program of research focused on advancing the science of deploying cognitive and behavioral interventions digitally in small, early-stage research projects in collaboration with Click’s industry-first Discovery research team. This will involve working closely with Discovery team members to build prototypes and with clinical research staff on project execution. \xa0This role requires regular crossfunctional team interactions, strong interpersonal and writing skills are required. The Scientist I will have opportunities to author publications based on these projects as well as ongoing early-stage Digital Therapeutics research projects, and to contribute to grant applications to secure funding for additional research.', '•\xa0Record of scientific publication and presentation', '•\xa0Present results at conferences and seminars', '•\xa0Experience in a clinical setting working with patients to deliver cognitive and behavioral therapies', 'Click Therapeutics is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, gender identity or gender expression, national origin, disability or veteran status. Click Therapeutics also complies with all applicable national, state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment as well as employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act. All applicants must have authorization to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. In certain circumstances it may be advantageous to Click Therapeutics to support the application(s) for temporary visa classification and/or sponsor applications for permanent residence so that a foreign national colleague can accept or remain in a work assignment in the U. S. For certain classes of temporary visas, the resulting work authorization may be specific to Click Therapeutics and the specific job and/or work site. Click Therapeutics may at its business discretion decide to or refrain from obtaining, maintaining and/or extending the temporary visa status and/or sponsoring a colleague for permanent residency and /or employment eligibility, considering factors such as availability of qualified U.S. workers and the colleague\'s long-term prospects for securing lawful permanent residence, among other reasons. Employment applicants requiring immigration sponsorship must disclose, when initial application for employment is made, whether or not they are legally authorized to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. and, if so, whether that authorization permits them to work in the job they seek. In no case should Click Therapeutics support of a colleague\'s temporary visa application or sponsorship of a colleague for permanent residence be construed to guarantee success of that application or amend or otherwise invalidate the "at-will" employment relationship between the colleague and Click Therapeutics.', '•\xa0Experience executing translational cognitive and behavioral research', 'This is a highly visible, creative, and agile role within a rapidly growing pre-IPO company in a nascent and fast-growing space. The role will be located in our trendy TriBeCa HQ, includes great benefits, and is an excellent wealth-building/equity opportunity for the right individual.', 'Title:', 'Location: TriBeCa, New York City, United States', 'Who We Are', 'About the Role', '•\xa0Experience working with patients with Serious Mental Illness (SMI) a plus', '•\xa0Assist in the training of junior team members including research coordinators and interns', '•\xa0Ph.D. in Psychology or Neuroscience (Cognitive, Behavioral or Affective focus) or related discipline', 'Title: Scientist I, Translational Sciences', '•\xa0Conduct data analyses and publish findings in top-tier journals', 'Benefits', '•\xa0Work with Product and Design team members to translate cognitive and behavioral interventions into digital format on Click Therapeutics’ proprietary platform', '•\xa0Assist with grant applications, progress reports, and IRB applications', '\xa0', 'Digital Therapeutics', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Responsibilities', 'Click Therapeutics, Inc. develops and commercializes software as prescription medical treatments for people with unmet medical needs. Through cognitive and neurobehavioral mechanisms, Click’s Digital Therapeutics™ enable change within individuals, and are designed to be used independently or in conjunction with biomedical treatments. The Clickometrics® adaptive data science platform continuously personalizes user experience to optimize engagement and outcomes. Following a groundbreaking clinical trial, Click’s industry-leading smoking cessation program is available nationwide through a wide variety of payers, providers, and employers. Click’s lead prescription program is entering into a multi-center, randomized, controlled, parallel-group, phase III FDA registration trial for the treatment of Major Depressive Disorder in adults. Major pipeline expansion and progression is in process.']

['', 'The fastest-growing high school sport in America isn’t basketball or football—it’s esports—and PlayVS is the official platform for High School esports. We offer an incredible, full-stack esport platform—game integrations, team building tools, leagues, tournaments, and more—and our software products tie everything together into a single, cohesive experience.', "We're looking for an extraordinary UX Researcher to join our growing team. UX Researchers at PlayVS are passionate about bringing the voice of the user to life across all of our products. job_title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer - Core Algorithms
job_text: ['Please note that our thredUP team is currently working remotely, however, this role will be expected to report to our Oakland location once we are safely able to return to the office.About ThredUPIn 2009, thredUP set out to make used clothes the new normal and create a more sustainable future for fashion. The company designed a modern resale experience that took the work and risk out of thrift, and converted a generation of secondhand skeptics to fans. Sellers send clothes directly to thredUP by the bagful, and buyers shop quality-checked items from over 35,000 brands at steep discounts. To power this marketplace, thredUP built an infrastructure that has recirculated 100 million unique garments via proprietary technology, data and logistics. thredUP most recently expanded its platform with Resale-as-a-Service (RaaS) to power resale for the world’s leading fashion brands. As a circular fashion pioneer, thredUP is reducing fashion’s impact on the planet and unlocking economic value for consumers and brands alike.About The RoleAt thredUP, we’re revolutionizing the clothing industry. Our marketplace introduces some unique challenges to solve in order to deliver a delightful inventory set at great value for our customers - are you up for the challenge?You will work on a broad set of domains, from building out and iterating on our pricing algorithms and surrounding services, to optimizing channels for surfacing the best product deals to the right customers, to building out a next generation promotional system focused on incremental growth and churn reduction. You will be working with a highly interdisciplinary team of software engineers, ML engineers, data scientists, analysts, and marketers. This role will require a mixture of software engineering, machine learning, customer insight, data science, and strong collaboration skills to be successful.ResponsibilitiesArchitect, build, maintain, and improve our pricing and promotional algorithms and their underlying systems. We are in the process of building a new set of services and platforms Implement end-to-end solutions for batch and real-time algorithmsBuild tooling around monitoring, logging, automated testing and A/B testingCollaborate with your peers and other teams to teach, learn and execute efficientlyContribute to improving our processes and engineering cultureWhat We Are Looking ForExceptional track record in delivering production grade engineering and ML solutions at different levels of the stackStrong experience with A/B testing and model evaluationsStrong experience in distributed systems design and best practicesProficiency with languages like Java, Ruby, PythonStrong experience with continuous integration, test automation, and monitoringAbility to work in a cross-functional team touching different parts of our core servicesExperience with real-time data processing technologiesWhat We Offer The opportunity to make a massive impact & influence outcomes for our business and customers alongside passionate coworkers Autonomy. The ability to make, own, and carry out decisions Competitive salary, equity and full benefits (health/dental/vision insurance & 401k) Work from anywhere most Tuesdays and Thursdays (what we call Maker Days) Catered lunch on Wednesdays, cold brew coffee and beer on tap Flexible PTOAt thredUP, our mission has been built on extending the lives of millions of unique clothing items. Much like our inventory, we believe diversity is key. As a diverse and inclusive workplace, we are committed to ensuring our employees are comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work every day. A unique perspective is critical to solving complex problems and inspiring a new generation to think secondhand first. Everyone is welcome - be you.Please note that our thredUP team is currently working remotely, however, this role will be expected to report to our Oakland location once we are safely able to return to the office.', 'Proficiency with languages like Java, Ruby, Python', 'Ability to work in a cross-functional team touching different parts of our core services', ' Competitive salary, equity and full benefits (health/dental/vision insurance & 401k)', 'Architect, build, maintain, and improve our pricing and promotional algorithms and their underlying systems. job_title: Quantitative Systems Pharmacology Position – Research Investigator
job_text: ['', 'Self-directed, independent and highly-motivated researcher who excels in a collaborative, multi-disciplinary environment.', 'Align QSP model deliverables with the clinical pharmacology and clinical development plans', 'Leverage existing virtual population workflows and script-based analysis packages.', 'Function as part of team to develop and rigorously assess the functionality, feasibility, efficiency and validity of new models.', 'Network with stakeholders in Discovery Biology, Clinical Development, and Translational Medicine to facilitate model development and application.', 'Degree requirements ', 'Experience with general programming and data analysis tools/languages such as Python, R, Spotfire would be particularly desirable.', 'Partnering with external groups to accelerate the internal Systems Pharmacology efforts in key disease areas.', 'Familiarity with best practices and issues', 'Desire to interact as a modeling and simulation expert across clinical development teams with experts from different functional areas (pre-clinical and clinical).', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills and the ability to interact effectively with scientists in other disciplines with a positive, collegial and collaborative attitude.', 'Summary', 'Hands-on experience with modeling software like Matlab/SimBiology is required.', 'Contribute to the design, execution and interpretation of clinical studies.', 'Developing and applying Quantitative Systems Pharmacology (QSP) models to address drug-discovery and development questions in the Fibrosis disease area.Function as part of team to develop and rigorously assess the functionality, feasibility, efficiency and validity of new models.Conduct extensive literature review to identify suitable mechanistic elements, interactions, rate constants and sub-modules for incorporation into systems (disease) models.Contribute to the design, execution and interpretation of clinical studies.Providing leadership to and collaboration with multidisciplinary project teams to develop and apply QSP models to aid in target prioritization, therapeutic modality selection, biomarker characterization and early clinical trial design.Partnering with external groups to accelerate the internal Systems Pharmacology efforts in key disease areas.Maintaining at the project level an active relationship with colleagues in Clinical Pharmacology & Pharmacometrics as well as in the advancement of Pharmacometrics.Network with stakeholders in Discovery Biology, Clinical Development, and Translational Medicine to facilitate model development and application.Align QSP model deliverables with the clinical pharmacology and clinical development plansLeverage existing virtual population workflows and script-based analysis packages.Stay informed with emerging literature and science in the systems biology/pharmacology modeling and simulation sciences.Build and maintain a personal track record of publication in the area of QSP.', 'Conduct extensive literature review to identify suitable mechanistic elements, interactions, rate constants and sub-modules for incorporation into systems (disease) models.', 'Ability to keep up to date with and propose the implementation of scientific and technological developments in the area of Systems Pharmacology/Biology.', 'Experience Requirements', 'Stay informed with emerging literature and science in the systems biology/pharmacology modeling and simulation sciences.', 'Excellent understanding of theory, principles and statistical aspects of advanced mathematical modeling and simulation, including numerical methods, parameter estimation/optimization, ordinary differential equations (ODEs) and how these can be applied in the development of complex models of biological pathways/systems.', 'Ability to learn new areas of biological sciences and build on solid foundation of quantitative skills to develop QSP models.', 'Providing leadership to and collaboration with multidisciplinary project teams to develop and apply QSP models to aid in target prioritization, therapeutic modality selection, biomarker characterization and early clinical trial design.', 'Self-directed, independent and highly-motivated researcher who excels in a collaborative, multi-disciplinary environment.Excellent understanding of theory, principles and statistical aspects of advanced mathematical modeling and simulation, including numerical methods, parameter estimation/optimization, ordinary differential equations (ODEs) and how these can be applied in the development of complex models of biological pathways/systems.Excellent oral and written communication skills and the ability to interact effectively with scientists in other disciplines with a positive, collegial and collaborative attitude.Good understanding of the basic principles of pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics.Ability to learn new areas of biological sciences and build on solid foundation of quantitative skills to develop QSP models.Ability to keep up to date with and propose the implementation of scientific and technological developments in the area of Systems Pharmacology/Biology.Hands-on experience with modeling software like Matlab/SimBiology is required.Experience with general programming and data analysis tools/languages such as Python, R, Spotfire would be particularly desirable.Desire to interact as a modeling and simulation expert across clinical development teams with experts from different functional areas (pre-clinical and clinical).Familiarity with best practices and issues', 'Good understanding of the basic principles of pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics.', 'Position Responsibilities (depending On Level/experience) Include', 'Developing and applying Quantitative Systems Pharmacology (QSP) models to address drug-discovery and development questions in the Fibrosis disease area.', 'Maintaining at the project level an active relationship with colleagues in Clinical Pharmacology & Pharmacometrics as well as in the advancement of Pharmacometrics.', 'Key Competency Requirements', 'Build and maintain a personal track record of publication in the area of QSP.']

We are all capable of working on any given project, and often shift tasks based on preference.', 'Experience with object-oriented and functional programming languages: Python, Scala etc.', 'Proficiency in general database administration concepts and efficient query writing', 'WHY JOIN THE BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE PLATFORM TEAM?', 'As a Data Engineer, you’ll be responsible for gathering and collecting data, storing it, doing batch processing or real-time processing on it, and serving it to data scientists and data analysts to easily query.', 'Experience with ETL and data integration tool : Airflow, Informatica PowerCenter', 'NCSOFT is a premiere digital entertainment company and global publisher with worldwide locations and more than 4,000 employees focused on bringing extraordinary games to life for millions of fans around the world. Established in 1997 and headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we quickly became a key leader in online games. Best known for critically acclaimed franchises including Lineage, Aion, Guild Wars, and Blade & Soul, NCSOFT is also one of the world’s top mobile developers with Lineage 2M occupying the #1 grossing revenue slot on Google Play. Our core goal is making people in this world happier by delivering games that entertain a globally connected audience has remained the same. Our culture is innovative, creative, collaborative and impactful, and we are passionate about creating the best gaming experiences for our players.', 'Experience with Big Data query and application knowledge: Hive, Impala, Fluentd, Spark, Sqoop, Pig etc.', 'We are a passionate and positive team that is always working on new data engineering technology and exciting projects including new game launches.We feel team members are most effective in working on what they are passionate about. We are all capable of working on any given project, and often shift tasks based on preference.We own the data platform, contributing to the design, implementation, and maintenance of these data services so we aren’t shy about experimenting with new tech. However, we take a measured approach in order to minimize introducing unnecessary technical debt.We collaborate with Analytics, Game Development, Platform and Publishing teams. Our data platform supports all kinds of data in an efficient environment that helps with analysis, customer care and company wide data-driven decisions.', 'Develop data processes for construction, mining, and modeling that are delivered to the data analyst/science team (30%)', 'Create large data warehouses by running some ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) that is used for analysis by the analyst/scientists (30%)', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience3+ years of day-to-day working experience as data engineerExperience with object-oriented and functional programming languages: Python, Scala etc.Experience with RDBMS (MS-SQL, MYSQL etc.) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB etc.)Experience with Big Data query and application knowledge: Hive, Impala, Fluentd, Spark, Sqoop, Pig etc.Experience with ETL and data integration tool : Airflow, Informatica PowerCenterExperience with AWS cloud services: EC2, S3, EMR, Glue, RedShift, Athena etc.Proficiency in general database administration concepts and efficient query writingExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAn eagerness to continually improve your skills, learn new technologies a willingness to take initiative beyond basic responsibilities', 'This is a full time, on-site position at our office in Aliso Viejo, CA. A casual, friendly work environment, a comprehensive benefits package, a competitive salary, and more are all part of what makes NCSOFT West a great place to work.', '3+ years of day-to-day working experience as data engineer', 'We own the data platform, contributing to the design, implementation, and maintenance of these data services so we aren’t shy about experimenting with new tech. However, we take a measured approach in order to minimize introducing unnecessary technical debt.', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Understanding data source (10%)', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience', 'An eagerness to continually improve your skills, learn new technologies a willingness to take initiative beyond basic responsibilities', 'Understanding data source (10%)Develop data processes for construction, mining, and modeling that are delivered to the data analyst/science team (30%)Create large data warehouses by running some ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) that is used for analysis by the analyst/scientists (30%)Install continuous pipelines of huge pools of filtered information so that data analyst/scientists can pull relevant data sets for their analyses (20%)Develop, construct, test and maintain architectures such as databases and large-scale data processing systems (10%)', 'We collaborate with Analytics, Game Development, Platform and Publishing teams. Our data platform supports all kinds of data in an efficient environment that helps with analysis, customer care and company wide data-driven decisions.', 'Experience with RDBMS (MS-SQL, MYSQL etc.) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB etc.)', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', 'WHAT YOU’LL NEED TO BE SUCCESSFUL', 'We are a passionate and positive team that is always working on new data engineering technology and exciting projects including new game launches.', 'Develop, construct, test and maintain architectures such as databases and large-scale data processing systems (10%)']

job_text: ['', 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.MD and/or Ph.D. in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., Ph.D. in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).\xa0Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.Are expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.\xa0Are comfortable acting as a focal point with product development teams in a consultative and scientifically rigorous manner, and juggling multiple ongoing, and competing priorities across a complex stakeholder landscape.An understanding of healthcare claims data.', 'An understanding of healthcare claims data.', 'You must wear a lot of ‘hats’ to make a product work. You excel in translating business and stakeholder needs into data science direction, and vice versa.\xa0', 'A tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first business', 'On offer:', 'Join an unparalleled platform to make a difference in healthcare in the US and beyond!\xa0', 'R&D Lead Data Scientist | Fortune 10 US Healthcare Company\xa0', 'Autonomy and end-to-end ownership', 'Skills and Qualifications:', 'You’ll be joining a team of MDs, PhDs, MBAs, and MSc from top tier universities and industries that bring their clinical, technical, and economic experience to bear on some of the toughest targets in healthcare – chronic disease.\xa0', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and moreA tight-knit team of passionate people and a tech-first businessAutonomy and end-to-end ownershipOpportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'Are expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.\xa0', 'Very competitive pay, bonus, full medical, dental & vision benefits, and more', 'MD and/or Ph.D. in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., Ph.D. in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).\xa0', 'Are comfortable acting as a focal point with product development teams in a consultative and scientifically rigorous manner, and juggling multiple ongoing, and competing priorities across a complex stakeholder landscape.', 'Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.', 'Opportunity for fast growth & promotion', 'Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.', 'Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.', "Intelletec has teamed up with one of the US's Leading Healthcare firms. They are going through a massive transformation and are looking for a Lead Data Scientist with deep experience working with claims/healthcare data – particularly those that have an understanding of its implications, and it's scientific and/or clinical value. As well as experience architecting and evaluating cutting edge mechanistic and empirical models.", 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.']

['', 'TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS', 'Experience in the design, development, and support of data analytic systems.', 'Working knowledge of orchestration tools such as MuleSoft, AWS Glue or AWS Step Functions is preferred but not required.', 'Degree not required.', 'Experience coding, debugging, testing, and troubleshooting throughout the application development process.', 'Residency Status:\xa0US Citizens and US Permanent Residents only, as sponsorship is not being offered at this time. **No Third Party Vendors**', 'Experience with distributed frameworks such as AWS Redshift, AWS EMR or Spark is required.', 'Location:\xa0100% Remote', 'AWS Data Engineer', 'Experience with multiple databases such as RDBMS, NoSQL, Document and Columnar is required.', 'Position Type:\xa06M contract to hire', 'Minimum of 5 years of data analytic software development.', 'Location:\xa0', 'Residency Status:\xa0', 'Experience with container orchestration, preferably Kubernetes.', 'Hourly / Salary:\xa0', 'GTN Technical Staffing is currently seeking an AWS Data Engineer for a 6+ month contract to hire opportunity that will be 100% remote, with offices located in Dallas, TX. The Data Engineer will be responsible for building and deploying analytic solutions to provide innovative, market ready solutions. You will be part of a team and have the opportunity to grow with and learn from other team members. In our culture of collaboration, you will participate in peer code reviews, provide comments and suggestions as well as capture and document software changes and requirements. Communicate effectively and adapt to changing requirements and outlines corrective action for given problems.', 'Hourly / Salary:\xa0BOE', 'Minimum of 5 years of data analytic software development.Experience with container orchestration, preferably Kubernetes.Experience with multiple databases such as RDBMS, NoSQL, Document and Columnar is required.Experience with distributed frameworks such as AWS Redshift, AWS EMR or Spark is required.Experience in the design, development, and support of data analytic systems.Experience coding, debugging, testing, and troubleshooting throughout the application development process.', '\xa0', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'HIGHLIGHTS', 'Position Type:\xa0', 'PREFERRED (BUT NOT REQUIRED)', 'Working knowledge of orchestration tools such as MuleSoft, AWS Glue or AWS Step Functions is preferred but not required.Degree not required.']

['Balancing roles and responsibilities across multiple concurrent studies and/or tasks including roles with task management oversight', 'FMG is seeking a highly organized, experienced, intelligent and motivated researcher in the area(s) of health communication, social marketing, persuasion, and/or social psychology, to support research projects across a variety of government contracts within our Health Communication Research and Strategy team. You will contribute to the design, execution, interpretation, and reporting of social-psychological, health behavior, and communication studies employing a variety of quantitative and qualitative methodologies.', 'Preferred qualifications:', 'At Fors Marsh Group (FMG), we combine the power of science and strategy to improve people’s lives. Most importantly, as a 2019 Washington Post Top Workplace, we are committed to putting people first and foster a culture that reflects that commitment. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we celebrate diversity and inclusivity as the foundation of a healthy, successful, and innovative work environment. outcomes (“you ship it, you own it”), working very efficiently and routinely deliver the right things in the front-end UI area.', 'We are go-to-market consultants who drive results that matter. As the leading authority on go-to-market solutions, we act as an extension of our client teams, providing the support, tools, and strategies to achieve important outcomes. ['', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', '-Advanced to Expert working knowledge of ANSI SQL or Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', 'POSITION:\xa0Senior Data Engineer', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', 'Education:', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', '-Perform Data Services benchmarking, enhancements, optimizations, and platform analytics', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', '-Experience with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau, QlikView/QlikSense, Microstrategy, or other Business Intelligence platforms.', '-Analytical', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0', '-Contribute to the definition and development of the overall data roadmap by making recommendations', '-Design database systems and develop tools for real-time and offline analytic processing', 'FLSA:\xa0Exempt', 'SCHEDULE:', '-1-year experience programing in C++, C#, or Python a plus', 'SCHEDULE:\xa0Standard business hours', '-Detail oriented', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present them in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', '-Standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needs', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB, Redshift, and Mesos is a plus', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience ", 'FLSA:\xa0', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0N/A', 'The Senior Data Engineer is responsible for designing and developing automated ETL processes for Business Intelligence reporting to facilitate business operations. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Spark, Scala, HBase, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a senior member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. It will be this person’s responsibility to perform code reviews, identify additional opportunities for efficiency, mentor team members, and be the subject matter expert for specific areas of the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW). Over time, these subject areas will be rotated to ensure each senior member gets an opportunity to have a full knowledge of the EDW.', 'POSITION:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', '-Design, develop, and test moderate to complex ETL processes using a variety of tools, which may include Transact-SQL, SSIS, Stored Procedures, -Functions, and existing ETL tool accelerators in Snowflake or SQL Server 2014 and later environments.', '-Determine methods and procedures for new or existing standards, operating procedures, and data processing tools.', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with Snowflake, MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB required', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', '-Integrate data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:', '-Interact cross-functionally with a variety of people, teams, and management. Work closely with analysts from sales, marketing, HR, and Finance, as well as product development, and data scientists, to identify opportunities and assess improvements of our products and services', '-Experience with public or hybrid cloud environments are a plus.', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', '-Independently design an effective and maintainable solution based on the gathered requirements that meet reliability, accuracy, and performance standards while also meeting or exceeding the user expectations', '-Passionate about data', '\xa0', '-Participate in research, development, and adoption of trends in big data, BI, and analytics', '-Quality driven', '-Minimum 5 years of experience with SQL required', '-Perform peer code reviews for other Seniors and Data Engineers, as well as train, mentor, and provide guidance to Data Engineers and other Data -Services and business users on processes and standards the Data Services group has established', '-Positive and creative attitude', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with database design and development required', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', '-Collaborate with various data providers to resolve data issues', '-Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and execute tasks across multiple projects with tight deadlines and aggressive goals.', '-Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'Experience:', '-Produce and maintain accurate project documentation for moderate to complex ETL processes', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0']

['', 'Strong communication skills to express oneself clearly both verbally and in writing. Persistent, active listening skills. ', 'Experience with analytics tools such as Apache Beam, Spark, JupyterLab, etc. ', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. ', 'Ability to develop and maintain positive working relationships throughout the organization. ', "Graduate degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent quantitative field and 5+ years of experience in a similar Data Engineer role. Deep understanding of distributed data management systems and related applications Mastery of data lake design and implementation considerations such as columnar storage formats and partitioning Experience building and automating data system components that enable data acquisition, cleansing, and persistence engineering; monitoring the performance of data analysis and system components and versioning of data snapshots, data lineage, schemas, and overall database systems Experience working with and extracting value from large, disconnected and/or unstructured datasets. Demonstrated ability to build processes that support data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. Experience with modern CI/CD pipeline technologies involving git repositories, static code analysis, test-driven development etc. Automated analysis optimizations based on performance metrics. Strong Python and cloud compute skills. Experience with GCP technologies or related Cloud technology experience. Experience in the full data engineering life-cycle, from business understanding to building operational systems. Understanding and experience navigating all types of database models and DBMS's. Must have excellent communication skills and can execute alone but is an awesome team player. Big picture approach a plus - able to incorporate business understanding into design and approach to achieve current value and prepare for future benefit. Consulting experience a plus - role includes client-facing meetings and communication. Excellent teamwork, coordination, influencing and communication skills. ", 'What qualities are we looking for?', 'A critical thinker with good problem-solving skills and an ability to multi-task. ', 'Work closely with other data and analytics team members to optimize the company’s data systems and pipeline architecture. ', 'Experience building and automating data system components that enable data acquisition, cleansing, and persistence engineering; monitoring the performance of data analysis and system components and versioning of data snapshots, data lineage, schemas, and overall database systems ', 'Excellent teamwork, coordination, influencing and communication skills. ', 'Qualifications and Skills:', 'An individual who communicates and collaborates well with IT and business teams. ['', 'About Convex\xa0', '- Generous parental leave policy', 'The Role', 'From an engineering perspective, every commercial property means massive data sets – and demanding performance and architecture requirements for your features to be put through.\xa0Geospatial data often requires GIS techniques to wrangle datasets – something different than the average SQL join.\xa0Data on virtually every commercial property in the US means a chance to see the country by way of satellite imagery, property boundaries, and several hundred other data elements we have already developed.\xa0\xa0', 'Work in the heart of a business with multiple partner teams to build cross-functional customer solutions', 'Our market is under the radar, but massive and ubiquitous commercial services industry. Our customers are responsible for the air we breathe, the water we drink, and the lighting, safety, security, and dozens of other privileges that we are incredibly fortunate to take for granted in buildings across all of America.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience building geospatial services and datasets, such as maps data\xa0', '5+ years of software backend/data engineering experience, including familiarity with data modeling, ETL, schema and system design, planning, implementation, maintenance, and documentation.\xa0', 'Convex is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity at our company. It's a 100-year-old industry impacting millions of people every day. We already work with some of the largest enterprise companies in the sector and were one of the fastest growing companies in the Winter 2019 YC batch. Our team is a unique mix of industry veterans from Carrier, Siemens, and Honeywell as well as founders from MIT, Harvard, and Georgia Tech. Based in San Francisco, our investors include Emergence Capital, 1984 Ventures, UP2398, Liquid2 (Joe Montana), YCombinator, the founders of PlanGrid, and others.", 'Sound knowledge about database app.\xa0The data team is not a support function or an experimental lab.\xa0Data is the star of our app, and the data team is at the heart of our business.\xa0\xa0', "Our product, Atlas, provides rich data on virtually every commercial property in the country (and all of the workflow software built on top of that to make it useful).\xa0Think Redfin for every commercial property, with Salesforce functionality to organize and track your work.\xa0For our users who serve these properties, this data and workflow becomes their secret weapon; there's nothing else like it available in the market job_title: Computational Chemistry Materials Science (CCMS) Summer Grad Intern
job_text: ['', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' You will work alongside Lab scientists performing computational simulation data analysis. Under limited direction and supervision will conduct research in assigned area. Perform technical assignments of a basic degree of complexity and provide advanced technical support to scientist in scientific research and development projects. Present work through presentations and/or poster sessions.', ' Demonstrated academic achievement in material science, computer science or a related field.', 'Qualifications', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', ' Present work through presentations and/or poster sessions.', 'Security Clearance: ', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' Experience applying basic scientific principles to solve technical problems and knowledge of PC and/or Macintosh computers to translate and report scientific data.', ' GPA of 3.0 or above.', '2020 Best Places to ', ' Must be a continuing college or university student in good standing at an accredited institution pursuing a graduate degree in chemistry, materials sciences, computational chemistry, or related field. Demonstrated academic achievement in material science, computer science or a related field. Experience applying basic scientific principles to solve technical problems and knowledge of PC and/or Macintosh computers to translate and report scientific data. Demonstrated effective communication skills. Ability to present and communicate concepts and ideas. Experience working with personal computers and familiarity with Word, Excel and PowerPoint. Ability to work in a team environment.', ' Perform technical assignments of a basic degree of complexity and provide advanced technical support to scientist in scientific research and development projects.', ' You will work alongside Lab scientists performing computational simulation data analysis.', ' Under limited direction and supervision will conduct research in assigned area.', ' Experience working with personal computers and familiarity with Word, Excel and PowerPoint.', 'About Us', ' Demonstrated effective communication skills.', 'Note: ', 'Essential Duties', ' Must be a continuing college or university student in good standing at an accredited institution pursuing a graduate degree in chemistry, materials sciences, computational chemistry, or related field.', ' Ability to work in a team environment.', ' Ability to present and communicate concepts and ideas.', 'Desired Qualifications']

['', 'Qualifications', '• Working knowledge of utilizing various research methodologies', '• 5+ years of industry (hands-on) working experience as a business analyst, market researcher, UX Researcher, or equivalent professional experience required', '• Engage the designers, product managers throughout the research process, and support the team to generate design solutions and product strategies', '• Advanced experience in behavioral analysis, qualitative analysis, and quantitative analysis (statistics, statistical modeling, data interpretation, etc.)', '• Identify and prioritize research questions based on business needs, project goals, and risks', 'Preferred Qualifications:', '• A portfolio demonstrating past work experience and deliverable', '• Experience with analyzing log data for user behaviors', 'Educational Requirement:', '5+ Years', '• Experience with supporting complex system (e.g., enterprise product) design, studying SMB and mid-Enterprise segments as well as vertical markets', 'Work experience requirement:', 'Master', 'Edit Responsibilities', '• Design and execute research studies with effective research methods (e.g., desk research, interviews, focus groups, usability testing, surveys, competitive analysis, etc.), representable participant profile, and efficient recruiting strategy', "You will be responsible for creating, driving, and implementing a research plan to understand\xa0company's diverse user base, and to discover actionable insights for creating the user experience for developing products and services for millions of business users. The research will be agile, keeping pace with the rapid innovation in the team. You will be working closely with a lead researcher, lead designers, and product managers.", '• Excellent strategic, analytical, and communication skills', '• Ability to occasionally travel internationally for face-to-face meetings and presentations, including a valid passport and visa eligibility (we’ll handle the paperwork for your visa, but you must be eligible for travel to China)', '• Experience with e-commerce businesses', '• Work with external analysts and manages research report gathering', 'You have a deep understanding of the methods and best practices of market research and user research. You are capable of delivering high-quality outputs, while working quickly on overlapping projects, juggling competing priorities, and organizing yourself.', 'Responsibilities:', '• Fluent in English and Chinese (Mandarin) will be highly desirable', 'Basic Qualifications:', '• Experience with business analysis, industry analysis, investment analysis, or supply chains analysis', '• Perform data analysis to extract insights and actionable recommendations from qualitative or quantitative data', '• Master’s degree in human-computer interaction (HCI), experimental psychology, cognitive science, anthropology, information science, sociology, human factors, business, Economics, or related discipline', '• Perform market research and analytics to generate market strategies, market trends, segmentation, competitive intelligence, investment prioritization.']

job_title: Senior User Experience Researcher, Search and Assistant
job_text: ['', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience in executing cross-functional design systems.', 'Work with Designers, Product Managers, Engineers and other UX Researchers to prioritize research opportunities in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.', 'Strategic research experience and ability to pitch research findings to director-level stakeholders.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.", " Master's degree or PhD in a related field. Experience in executing cross-functional design systems. Experience with statistics and larger data-sets, or any other mixed-methods research tools such as survey analysis, logs analysis, etc. Strategic research experience and ability to pitch research findings to director-level stakeholders. Understanding of the strengths and shortcomings of different research methods, including when and how to apply them during the product development process. Ability to work quickly, try new things while dealing with setbacks, entrepreneurial thinking, and navigating company dynamics. ", ' Conduct independent research on multiple aspects of products and experiences. Collect and analyze user behavior through lab studies, field visits, ethnography, surveys, benchmark studies, server logs and online experiments (A/B testing). Work with Designers, Product Managers, Engineers and other UX Researchers to prioritize research opportunities in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment. Understand and incorporate complex technical and business requirements into research. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports and in-person presentations. ', '8 years of experience within User Experience, Human-Computer Interaction, applied research setting, and/or product research and development.', 'Understand and incorporate complex technical and business requirements into research.', 'Experience with statistics and larger data-sets, or any other mixed-methods research tools such as survey analysis, logs analysis, etc.', "Master's degree or PhD in a related field.", 'About The Job', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports and in-person presentations.', 'Mountain View, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA', " Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 8 years of experience within User Experience, Human-Computer Interaction, applied research setting, and/or product research and development. Research experience in consumer products, social media, apps/mobile, news, artificial intelligence, machine learning, or other complex systems utilizing methods such as usability studies, contextual inquiry, and surveys. ", 'Research experience in consumer products, social media, apps/mobile, news, artificial intelligence, machine learning, or other complex systems utilizing methods such as usability studies, contextual inquiry, and surveys.', 'Ability to work quickly, try new things while dealing with setbacks, entrepreneurial thinking, and navigating company dynamics.', 'Understanding of the strengths and shortcomings of different research methods, including when and how to apply them during the product development process.', 'Collect and analyze user behavior through lab studies, field visits, ethnography, surveys, benchmark studies, server logs and online experiments (A/B testing).', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'Conduct independent research on multiple aspects of products and experiences.']

['', 'Knowledge and experience with characterization of materials by microscopy (SEM, AFM) or spectroscopy (IR, XRD) techniques', 'Qualifications', 'This position will involve significant interaction between Argonne National Laboratory and Northwestern University, with the postdoctoral researcher holding a joint appointment with Argonne National Laboratory. The postdoctoral researcher will be expected to spend 2-3 days per week at Argonne. The position is open immediately and is funded for one year with the potential for renewal (subject to available funding and performance evaluation).\xa0', 'This position will focus on the development of a library of functionalized covalent organic framework (COF) materials along with characterization to elicit structure-property-performance relationships as they relate to pressure-driven membrane processes for water treatment applications. In addition to materials synthesis, analytical characterization skills are desirable as the candidate will work to understand, characterize, and optimize structure-property-function relationships. ', 'Experience with porous organic materials is desirable', 'Northwestern University and Argonne National Laboratory are seeking a postdoctoral candidate to work in the area of functional porous organic materials\xa0in the Northwestern-Argonne Institute of Science and Engineering (NAISE).', 'Postdoctoral Training Opportunity – Organic\xa0Synthesis and Material Characterization', 'Additional experience with membrane technology ideal but not required\xa0', 'PhD degree in chemistry, materials science, engineering or a related field', 'Experience applying characterization techniques (AFM, N2\xa0physisorption, contact angle) and\xa0interpreting data\xa0to understand structure-property relationships is desirable', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills in English', 'Demonstrated experience in the design, synthesis, and processing of organic materials\xa0']

job_title: FPGA Wideband Signal Processing Researcher - Job Order 3077
job_text: ['', '" Designing, analyzing, modeling, simulating, and implementing high speed, extremely wideband real-time FPGA solutions using the RF SoC, including PS and PL components." Working closely with signal processing algorithm researchers to develop algorithm specifications, bit-exact simulations, and test vectors, as well as providing feedback to algorithm researchers on suggested modifications." Implementing, debugging, and testing high speed signal processing solutions." Working closely with radio frequency (RF) engineering researchers to ensure high performance interfaces between digital and analog transmitting and receiving systems." Writing design documents, simulation and test reports, and system documentation.', 'Main Responsibilities Include', '" Writing design documents, simulation and test reports, and system documentation.', '" Designing, analyzing, modeling, simulating, and implementing high speed, extremely wideband real-time FPGA solutions using the RF SoC, including PS and PL components.', '" BS/BA, MS/MA, Ph.D. or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering, or a related relevant field', 'Responsibilities', '" Working closely with signal processing algorithm researchers to develop algorithm specifications, bit-exact simulations, and test vectors, as well as providing feedback to algorithm researchers on suggested modifications.', '" 3+ years of experience in developing RF solutions', '" Citizenship Verification: This position requires verification of US Citizenship', '" Citizenship Verification: This position requires verification of US Citizenship" 3+ years of experience in developing RF solutions" BS/BA, MS/MA, Ph.D. or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering, or a related relevant field" Candidates must have at least an active Secret security clearance" Strong written and spoken communications/presentation skills', '" Working closely with radio frequency (RF) engineering researchers to ensure high performance interfaces between digital and analog transmitting and receiving systems.', '" Candidates must have at least an active Secret security clearance', '" Strong written and spoken communications/presentation skills', '" Implementing, debugging, and testing high speed signal processing solutions.', 'Requirements']

['', ' This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams. This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems. ', '  This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams. This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems.   Candidates for this position must be able to write Python 3.7 and Google BigQuery scripts to manipulate and analyze data.   Candidates must also be able to perform analyses on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide.   Candidates must also be able to design and construct data visualizations, i.e., interactive dashboards, for business use in Tableau.  ', 'Essential Duties And Responsibilities', 'Summary', 'Education And Or Experience', ' Candidates must also be able to perform analyses on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide. ', ' Candidates must also be able to design and construct data visualizations, i.e., interactive dashboards, for business use in Tableau. ', ' Candidates for this position must be able to write Python 3.7 and Google BigQuery scripts to manipulate and analyze data. ']

['', 'TS/SCI with Poly is required for this position**Red Arch Solutions is a proven and effective small business integrator and consultant, recognized as a leading provider of IT development to the Federal Government. [' ', 'We need someone with fluency in Python, and experience with common data science libraries, such as Pandas, numpy, and scikit-learn.\xa0Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks is important too.\xa0 ', 'Senior Data Scientist (NLP) specializing in building Machine Learning and NLP models.\xa0', "Once you apply, we'll forward you all company and leadership team information and set up a call to discuss the opportunity ASAP.", 'Our CONFIDENTIAL, pre-IPO hypergrowth client in San Jose is looking to add an exceptional Senior Data Scientist (NLP) specializing in building Machine Learning and NLP models.\xa0 ']

['', 'Evaluate accuracy of detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0', 'Proven track record of successful application of ML to resolve hard problems\xa0', 'Get involved in customers calls on occasion to discuss future product directions\xa0', "Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0Research and develop new ML models as necessary to meet agreed upon product requirements and goals\xa0Develop POC as needed and help draft the engineering design to be handed over to the dev team\xa0Evaluate accuracy of detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0Research product workflow change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0Get involved in customers calls on occasion to discuss future product directions\xa0Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0Participate in security conference to increase awareness on online fraud and abuse", 'Company Description:', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.', 'Job Description:', 'Benefits:', 'Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models\xa0', "Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0", 'Nice to haves:', 'Startup Experience', 'Solid understanding of the world wide web ecosystem, including protocols (HTTP, DNS), coding (HTML, JS, CSS), issues around privacy…\xa0', 'General Requirements:', 'A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Research product workflow change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Competitive salary, equity, and a robust benefits package includes top-notch medical, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, commuter benefits and we cover 95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa03+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models\xa0Ability to code, experiment and fail fast\xa0Proven track record of successful application of ML to resolve hard problems\xa0Solid understanding of the world wide web ecosystem, including protocols (HTTP, DNS), coding (HTML, JS, CSS), issues around privacy…\xa0Effective oral and written communication to peers, leadership, and both technical and non-technical audiences\xa0Ability to adapt quickly and constructively to changes\xa0A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0', 'Participate in security conference to increase awareness on online fraud and abuse', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0Startup Experience', 'Research and develop new ML models as necessary to meet agreed upon product requirements and goals\xa0', 'Competitive salary, equity, and a robust benefits package includes top-notch medical, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, commuter benefits and we cover 95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0', 'Develop POC as needed and help draft the engineering design to be handed over to the dev team\xa0', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Ability to code, experiment and fail fast\xa0', 'Effective oral and written communication to peers, leadership, and both technical and non-technical audiences\xa0', 'Ability to adapt quickly and constructively to changes\xa0', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Required Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Deep Learning, Data Modeling, HTTP, DNS, HTML, JavaScript, JS, CSS, Python, R, SQL', 'Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', '.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Our Perks', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', '===', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', 'Responsibilities', 'Required Qualifications', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)']

['', 'ETL - MUST *AWS *Informatica *Redshift - MUST *SQL *Data Engineer', 'Description', ' ETL * AWS * Data * Informatica * Redshift * SQL * Data Engineer * My client, a Glendale Service based industry is looking for a Data Engineer to join their engineering team. The position will start off remote and it will be on-site when the office is open. The Senior Data Engineer should have at least 2 years of experience in Redshift and at least 3 years in ETL. The day to day responsbiltitlies for the Senior Data Engineer position includes maintaining ETL standards, managing real time data processing, and utilizing Python to help pull data from the database. This is a great opportunity for a Senior Data Engineer to join well established company that is well known in the industry and become more advance in AWS. If you are interested in this opportunity, please call Vice President - Division Director Jimmy Escobar at (310) 209-6838 or Jimmy.Escobar@RHT.com - https://www.linkedin.com/in/jimmyescobar/', 'Requirements']

job_text: ['', 'Qualifications', ' Meteorology/atmospheric sciences, to include atmospheric dynamics and thermodynamics; weather system analysis and prediction; physical meteorology; and remote sensing of the atmosphere Physics Ordinary differential equations ', 'Minimum 10 years of experience working directly in the atmospheric sciences field, with associated experiences in numerical weather/climate prediction, experience in modern weather data production and dissemination processes.', 'Engage with key stakeholders in the requirements process to document those shortfalls. ', 'Working knowledge of the following Meteorology/atmospheric sciences, to include atmospheric dynamics and thermodynamics; weather system analysis and prediction; physical meteorology; and remote sensing of the atmosphere Physics Ordinary differential equations  ', ' Minimum 10 years of experience working directly in the atmospheric sciences field, with associated experiences in numerical weather/climate prediction, experience in modern weather data production and dissemination processes. ["If the above seems like a fit, then apply!!Also, if the title doesn't seem just right for you, talk to us and we will change it - if the job is for you, we will make it work.", ' Optimize database architecture by trading off storage and computation to achieve low cost and high performance.', ' Build and maintain scalable data pipelines for both batch and stream processing in a cloud-computing environment.', ' 4-8 years of experience in data engineering or similar work.', ' Proactively automate manual processes throughout the business for higher efficiency, robustness, and speed.', ' Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field (Masters or PhD preferred)', ' Experience with visualization and reporting tools, such as Looker and Tableau.', ' Full stack experience, including microservice and web app development.', ' Enforce production standards and governance best practices in the management of enterprise-level data, metrics, and reports.', ' Extensive experience with cloud infrastructure and tools for AWS and GCP.', ' Interact face-to-face with business stakeholders, develop cooperative relationships, and acquire domain knowledge of the business.', ' Knowledge of big data platforms, such as Hadoop and Spark.', 'CRB Workforce, LLC provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'We are currently looking for an amazing Data Engineer. We have one open position. Please apply and we can discuss!', 'This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', ' Demonstrable proficiency in Python development and advanced SQL querying.', ' Demonstrated strength in data modeling, ETL development, data warehousing, data pipeline and data lake creation.', 'This is a Full Time/Direct Hire role for one of our amazing clients. You will be working with some of the brightest minds in industry.', ' Build and maintain scalable data pipelines for both batch and stream processing in a cloud-computing environment. Apply dimensional modeling to design tables and views that map business processes into an enterprise data model. Optimize database architecture by trading off storage and computation to achieve low cost and high performance. Build and support complex ETL infrastructure to deliver clean and reliable data to the organization. Support the development of new products and services via ingestion, processing, and formatting data for reporting and analytics. Interact face-to-face with business stakeholders, develop cooperative relationships, and acquire domain knowledge of the business. Proactively automate manual processes throughout the business for higher efficiency, robustness, and speed. Enforce production standards and governance best practices in the management of enterprise-level data, metrics, and reports.', ' Support the development of new products and services via ingestion, processing, and formatting data for reporting and analytics.', ' Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, or related field (Masters or PhD preferred) Excellent communication and inter-personal skills. Versatile and quick learner with ability to pick up any new skills necessary to get the job done. Demonstrated strength in data modeling, ETL development, data warehousing, data pipeline and data lake creation. Extensive experience with cloud infrastructure and tools for AWS and GCP. Demonstrable proficiency in Python development and advanced SQL querying. Strong grasp of business elements and ability to convert requirements into database models and full-data pipeline systems. Experience with visualization and reporting tools, such as Looker and Tableau. 4-8 years of experience in data engineering or similar work.
